0010110100100000 1001100100011101 1 -> sum: 1100011000111110, cout: 0

0011000011101101 0110001000111001 1 -> sum: 1001001100100111, cout: 0
0111010001000110 0011000110000001 0 -> sum: 1010010111000111, cout: 0
0011111000101100 1001111101011101 0 -> sum: 1101110110001001, cout: 0
1011010101010000 0011111011011000 0 -> sum: 1111010000101000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
